itunes:title: Lent 2020 Week 2 with Patti Sauls
title: Lent 2020 Week 2 with Patti Sauls
description:
It's week two of Lent, and Raechel and Amanda are joined by friend and She Reads Truth devotional writer, Patti Sauls. If that last name sounds familiar, it's because Patti is also the wife of one of our favorite pastors and She Reads Truth Podcast alum, Scott Sauls.

As the group explores the book of Jeremiah, they also discuss fasting, life in Manhattan with small children, and their strong feelings about jotting down notes in their Bibles.

Read with Us: 

This episode corresponds to Week 2 of the She Reads Truth Lent reading plan found on the She Reads Truth app and SheReadsTruth.com. 

Shop the Lent collection at ShopSheReadsTruth.com 

Save 15% on your first She Reads Truth Subscription Box when you use the code BOX15. 

Show notes can be found at shereadstruth.com/podcast/lent-2020-week-2-with-patti-sauls/
